ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: /assist problem
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL!  I can see it now, Evulia closes her eyes, belts out a few tunes, and slashes wildly at Evulia. Well, if anyone gets alarmed by it I ll just tell them I
ygData.messageBody:
LOL! I can see it now, "Evulia closes her eyes, belts out a few tunes, and
slashes wildly at Evulia."

Well, if anyone gets alarmed by it I'll just tell them I play punk rock and
thought slashing myself before battle would be really hardcore! /em Evulia
climbs up onto her groupmates shoulders and begins crowd surfing.

But now I'm just getting silly, and I REALLY should get some work done. ;
^)

Peace
Evulia, mosher of Tunare




"Legba Work"
<mattdeba@voi To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
cenet.com> cc:
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re:
10/13/2000 /assist problem
12:29 PM
Please
respond to
eqbards






I know a few people who include emotes in their assist keys. Heres the
problem, if the assist fails (IE talk isn't hitting anything) they usally
end up emoting ME since if there target was blank, it has probably switched
to me when my song pulsed.

So I get all these horrible emotes done to me :(



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
